thread.section_title: The Peninsula Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful property, great location
thread.title_full: Beautiful property, great location - Review of The Peninsula Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mark M
title: Beautiful property, great location
text:
Stayed for a week. Hotel is beautiful, as you would expect from the Peninsula group. Situated on Ave Kleber, just a short walk from the Champs Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe
Great facilities - incredible in room amenities, everything from the lights,curtains to the TV controlled from a tablet - bathrooms are spectacular. One of the few luxury hotels that has a pool. The staff were exceptional, nothing is too much trouble to ensure your stay in Paris is a memorable one. The breakfast in Le lobby restaurant was something to look forward to each day, and dinner at the rooftop restaurant L'oiseau Blanc was superb . Will certainly return next time we're in Paris.
